altTitles.ja: ダーリンの上手な育ち方

description.en:
Moved by the innocent eyes of his childhood friend Shuichi, who asks him to be his lover when he grows up, Asahi inadvertently promises him, "When you grow up, it'll be great if you become a high-income, tall, and highly educated person."
And then--the cute little child has successfully achieved the three highs at the age of 20.
He's coming to fulfill that promise!
He shows his love with daily kisses and hugs, and maybe even more...?
When the grown-up Shuichi approaches him with all his masculine charm, Asahi can't resist him, either mentally or physically!?
It wasn't supposed to be like this!
When Asahi can't seem to be honest with himself, what action does Shuichi take--?!
description.ja:
大人になったら恋人になってほしい、幼なじみの秀一（しゅういち）の純粋な目にほだされた旭（あさひ）は、うっかり「大人になって、高収入高身長高学歴になれたらいいよ」と約束する。
そして――幼く可愛かった子どもは見事20歳で三高を達成。
あの時の約束を果たしに迫ってきた！
毎日のキスやハグに好きアピール、更にはそれ以上のことも…？
成長した秀一にオスらしい魅力全開で迫られると、心も身体もまったく抗えない!?
こんなはずじゃなかったのに！
なかなか素直になれない旭に秀一がとった行動は――!?
description.vi: “Miễn là sau này Shuichi lớn lên có thu nhập cao hơn anh, lớn hơn anh, học giỏi hơn anh nhé” ba điều kiện trở thành người yêu mà Asahi đặt ra cho cậu nhóc nhỏ tuổi Shuichi giờ đã thành hiện thực. Trước những cử chỉ thân mật, gây thương nhớ của Shuichi liệu lời hứa năm ấy có hiệu nghiệm?
